content:
How can I create a function in JavaScript that identifies and highlights all instances of the word "ubiquitous" in a given text on a webpage?
Here's an example of the text:
var text = "The internet is ubiquitous in modern society. Its reach is ubiquitous, from cities to rural areas. The concept of the internet of things aims to make technology even more ubiquitous."
I want to be able to highlight every occurrence of the word "ubiquitous" with a yellow background color. Can you provide the necessary code to achieve this?
